column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////As for the whole restaurant experience
column2: it was rough. Long lines: over an hour wait. And it didn't have a convenient bar (yes
column3: there's a bar; it was packed three deep with Sox fans). We pre-ordered
column4: which seemed like it was a good idea. We finally got our table in a very crowded
column6: hard-to-hear-yourself-think basement. It only took four requests to get a glass of water. And the wine list was mediocre.
